## Make a graph

```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
View(pie_crab)
```

### I am creating a plot of fiddler crab carapace widths observed at the different latitudes

```{r}
ggplot(pie_crab, aes(x = latitude
                     , y = size)) +
  geom_jitter()
```
